name: Cat Litter Dry Garden
description:
(Desktop version runs better!)

In the US, cat litter is a $2 billion industry consuming five billion pounds (2.3 Mt) of mined clay annually.

Dry gardens are usually filled with gravel.  The act of raking the gravel into a pattern recalling waves or rippling water, known as samon has or hōkime  has an aesthetic function.

Coots is a special little boy and the world is a big place.

Help Coots and yourself escape from it all.

Time to create your own Cat Litter Dry Garden
